content: I have a Communication based on a Communication Request with multiple recipients and have trouble representing the status. If not all recipients received the information, then between them they would have different status and I don't know how to represent this in the Communication. Someone knows how to do it?
If each Communication happens separately, then you should have 3 Communication instances (one per recipient) all tied to the one CommunicationRequest. Each would have their own recipient
Thank you for your help :smile:
